name: R.G.BEAT
description:
NOTE FOR MAC USERS: If you recieve an error message about the file being damaged, follow the instructions HERE to fix it.

R.G.Beat is a rhythm based top-down shooter. Move and change color to the beat to destroy your enemies! Dash through pickups to gain powerful new effects. Beat your high score and survive through 10 increasingly difficult waves... if you can.

Created in 2 weeks for the #AmazeMeGJ

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim/Shoot

Shift - Dash

Q - Quit to Menu

R - Restart

Alt + Enter - Fullscreen

Music:

Retro Synth by Prigida

Odyssey by John Tasoulas | https://soundcloud.com/john-tasoulas

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
